cities.Name: Aurangabad
cities.Description: The old forts, age-old eateries, and museums narrate their own tales. The distinctive scent of naan qualia tingles both your nose and taste buds. And with gorgeous sunsets over the sky like a giant painting, Aurangabad breaks all stereotypes one wonder at a time. Welcome to a city with rich heritage, stupendous monuments, and world-famous caves.

stays.staysDescription: Stay with us at Zostel Aurangabad, the only backpacker hostel of Aurangabad. Centrally-located, fun, social and affordable place to hang out with travellers from around the world.

cities.Name: Bangalore
cities.Description: The usually busy megacity of Bangalore is pictured with lanes filled with bars and pubs, rightfully balanced by monuments and ancient buildings standing against the test of time. Home to classic art forms such as Bharatnatyam, Kuchipudi, Manipuri, and an active theatre community, Bangalore takes creativity very seriously, adorning the inside of the city! Not

stays.staysDescription: A cool & cosy backpacker hostel right in the middle of the action - in Indiranagar. Close to the most major landmarks of the city, we offer an apt base for a social traveller along with the promise of brand Zostel.

cities.Name: Barot
cities.Description: The sound of car horns is replaced by the endless chirping of native birds. You’ll find traffic, lots of it, but only of flocks of mountain sheep and horses grazing nearby. And instead of skyscrapers and pollution, the window to your workplace hosts

stays.staysDescription: Zostel Barot (Rajgundha) in Kangra provides adults-only accommodation with a shared lounge and a garden. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

cities.Name: Chitkul
cities.Description: About Perched up above most of India, in the Himalayas bordering Tibet, Chitkul is the kind of beauty that leaves you thoroughly awe-struck and grasping for more. The mountains here seem mightier than most other places, the air seems quieter, and life much slower. Coloured pink with Buckwheat blooms in Spring, white with thick blankets of snow in winters.

stays.staysDescription: Stay at Zostel Chitkul - the last traveller hostel on Indo-Tibet border with panoramic views of the Himalayas.
Zostel Sangla is an offbeat and social backpacker hostel in Sangla village, Himachal Pradesh. Enjoy our in-house cafe, common room activities, panoramic views, and more.
Zostel Homes Rakchham (Chitkul) is situated in Saturang and offers a garden and a terrace. Guests have a private balcony.

cities.Name: Coorg
cities.Description: A land of refreshing waterfalls, mystical mountain tops, sprawling green landscapes, and a variety of flora and fauna that lives within it, Coorg is the textbook definition of a hill station. And like that’s not enough, Coorg happens to be home.

stays.staysDescription: Stay in the lap of nature at Zostel Coorg - a backpacker hostel that allows you to mingle with fellow travelers over coffee, bonfires & hikes.
Stay with us in Coorg at an offbeat location away from crowds in a peaceful, premium homestay. Enjoy the warm hospitality and activities and live the simple, rural life with the locals!
Stay with us in Gokulam - the most central location for any traveller in the yoga hub of Mysuru. Enjoy the yoga retreat with backpackers from around the world at our cosy hostel, Zostel Mysore.

cities.Name: Dalhousie
cities.Description: One of the most well-planned hill stations in the North, Dalhousie houses colonial-era architectural marvels jacketed by lush green mountainscapes. Moreover, the snow-capped Himalayas complementing the old world charm of the ancient

stays.staysDescription: Stay at Zostel Dalhousie - a quaint, scenic backpacker hostel among Himalayan peaks of Chamba valley. A travelers' den to feel & explore Dalhousie on a budget.

cities.Name: Delhi
cities.Description: A little goes a long way when it comes to exploring Delhi and one thing that’s for sure is that you won’t have to travel too far to explore its absolute best. The narrow lanes of Old Delhi overflooded with people tantalise you with the most palatable street food, whereas the quiet streets of Central & Southern Delhi house monuments that speak of the royal Mughal dynasty galore. With a kickass nightlife, impressive food scene, and an arena of places to explore, shop, and live

stays.staysDescription: Stay at Zostel Delhi - THE most centrally located, top-ranked backpacker hostel of Delhi. Direct airport metro and walking distance to train station, Connaught Place and Old Delhi.

cities.Name: Dobhi
cities.Description: Null

stays.staysDescription: Explore the offbeat Fojal valley of Himachal Pradesh with Zostel Dobhi, a serene yet lively backpacking hostel located upon a ridge, overlooking a stream, featuring an in-house restaurant, indoor workation areas, common rooms, and a bonfire area.

cities.Name: Gangtok
cities.Description: Gangtok rose to prominence after Buddhist monasteries found refuge in its mountain land. Since then, it has been the ultimate gateway to one of the most hidden and adventurous states in our country, Sikkim. With a jazzy nightlife, eateries

stays.staysDescription: Zostel Gangtok in Gangtok provides adults-only accommodation with a shared lounge and a terrace. Located around 700 m from Palzor Stadium, the hostel with free WiFi is also 3.5 km away from Do Drul Chorten Monastery.

cities.Name: Gokarna
cities.Description: Gokarna is a beach-studded twin of Goa, only less crowded and more chilled out. Go on hikes, hop from one beach to another or simply relax and let life pass you by for a change; Gokarna is sure to surprise you in all the right ways. An ideal day here consists of catching a sunset while you gorge on seafood and beer at a beachside cafe, listening to the faint

stays.staysDescription: Stay with us at the best sea view backpacker hostel in Gokarna. Perched on the cliff overlooking Gokarna Main Beach, Zostel Gokarna is your spot to hike, unwind and chill with fellow travelers.

cities.Name: Jaipur
cities.Description: Home to some of Rajasthan’s most popular sights, Jaipur is a part of the Golden Triangle that usually tops every traveller’s bucket list. With its old-world charm and incredible shopping markets, Jaipur offers the best of both worlds to travellers.

stays.staysDescription: Stay with us at Zostel Jaipur - the two-time best Indian hostel award winner. Centrally located at Hawa Mahal - this backpacker hostel is the pride of brand Zoste

cities.Name: Jaisalmer
cities.Description: Jaisalmer is golden in the most profound sense, with the colour reflecting in its houses, streets, and desert alike. Travellers look forward to a lip-smacking plate of daal baati, walking through a fort which is a city in itself, and exploring the textiles to bring home a skirt or a mat. Accompanying these, Jaisalmer gives you a surreal experience of camping in the desert

stays.staysDescription: Stay at our colourful hostel located INSIDE the royal Jaisalmer fort. With an Open-to-Sky Lounge offering a breathtaking panoramic view of the Golden city, Zostel Jaisalmer is a quirky backpackers' haven.

cities.Name: Jodhpur
cities.Description: Of palaces that showcase its cultural lineage, narrow lanes filled with treasures big and small, and food combinations that are likely to enthrall the inner foodie in you, welcome to the true blue of Rajasthan, Jodhpur. The royalty of the city is bound to follow you everywhere you go in the form of its heritage, grandeur, and ancient palaces that define it.

stays.staysDescription: Explore the blue city with Zostel at our colourful backpacker hostel - overlooking the majestic Mehrangarh fort and close to the Ghanta Ghar, the Heart of Jodhpur.

cities.Name: Manali
cities.Description: Chill with us at Zostel Manali amidst panoramic Himalayan views, apple orchard and a gorgeous garden cafe. Located at the unbeatable location of Old Manali, our backpacker hostel is an ideal place to laze around with other backpackers.

stays.staysDescription: Chill with us at Zostel Manali amidst panoramic Himalayan views, apple orchard and a gorgeous garden cafe. Located at the unbeatable location of Old Manali, our backpacker hostel is an ideal place to laze around with other backpackers.

A refreshing escape awaits you at Zostel Vashisht, our swanky new backpacking hostel near Manali. Enjoy uninterrupted views of snow-capped mountains, hearty cafe food, hip common areas, and unique attic dorms at our chic hostel in Himachal Pradesh.

Explore the offbeat Fojal valley of Himachal Pradesh with Zostel Dobhi, a serene yet lively backpacking hostel located upon a ridge, overlooking a stream, featuring an in-house restaurant, indoor workation areas, common rooms, and a bonfire area.
Stay with us in Manali at an offbeat location away from crowds in a peaceful, premium homestay. Enjoy the warm hospitality and activities and live the simple, rural life with the locals!.
For the first time in India, you can experience a stay in Geodesic Domes Glamping tents which are perched at a height of over 2600 mt, with a splendid view of Dhauldhar ranges and Manali valley.

cities.Name: Fagu
cities.Description: Chill with us at Zostel Manali amidst panoramic Himalayan views, apple orchard and a gorgeous garden cafe. Located at the unbeatable location of Old Manali, our backpacker hostel is an ideal place to laze around with other backpackers.

stays.staysDescription: Stay with us in Cheog (Near Fagu, Shimla), an offbeat location away from crowds in a peaceful, premium homestay. Enjoy the warm hospitality and activities and live the simple, rural life with the locals!

cities.Name: Spiti
cities.Description: Discover Spiti with Asia's highest backpacker hostel - Zostel Spiti. Top ranked by guests, Zostel Spiti fosters new friendships and helps you explore the majestic Spiti on a budget.

stays.staysDescription: Discover Spiti with Asia's highest backpacker hostel - Zostel Spiti. Top ranked by guests, Zostel Spiti fosters new friendships and helps you explore the majestic Spiti on a budget.
Zostel Homes Kibber (Spiti or Kaza) is set in Kibber and offers a shared lounge, a garden and a terrace. This homestay offers accommodation with a balcony.
Zostel Homes Tabo (Spiti) is located in Tabo and offers a shared lounge and a terrace. With mountain views, this accommodation provides a balcony.

cities.Description: Located in Shimla in the Himachal Pradesh region, Zostel Homes Kotkhai (Shimla) provides accommodation with free private parking. There is a shared lounge at this property and guests can go hiking nearby.

stays.staysDescription: Located in Shimla in the Himachal Pradesh region, Zostel Homes Kotkhai (Shimla) provides accommodation with free private parking. There is a shared lounge at this property and guests can go hiking nearby.

cities.Description: Set in Mashobra in the Himachal Pradesh Region, 16 km from Shimla, Tranquil Countryside Homes boasts a terrace and views of the mountains. There is a games room on site and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

stays.staysDescription: Set in Mashobra in the Himachal Pradesh Region, 16 km from Shimla, Tranquil Countryside Homes boasts a terrace and views of the mountains. There is a games room on site and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

cities.Name: Pushkar
cities.Description: Stay at Zostel Pushkar, a traveller and digital nomad friendly backpacking hostel in Pushkar with a swimming pool, cafe, workstations, indoor games, and rooftop with a view of the Aravali hills.

stays.staysDescription: Stay at Zostel Pushkar, a traveller and digital nomad friendly backpacking hostel in Pushkar with a swimming pool, cafe, workstations, indoor games, and rooftop with a view of the Aravali hills.

Zostel Homes Pushkar in Pushkar offers accommodation with free WiFi, 7 km from Varaha Temple, 7 km from Brahma Temple and 7 km from Pushkar Lake. Situated 6 km from Pushkar Fort, the property features a garden and free private parking.

cities.Name: Ramgadh
cities.Description: Zostel Home Ramgarh is your laid-back luxury escape in a quaint Uttarakhand hill station, only 6-7 hours from Delhi.

stays.staysDescription: Zostel Home Ramgarh is your laid-back luxury escape in a quaint Uttarakhand hill station, only 6-7 hours from Delhi.

A cosy, peaceful backpacker hostel in the mountains of Uttarakhand - 1.5 hrs from lake town of Nainital. Situated in a secluded area with lush natural scenery and mountain views, Zostel Mukteshwar is an ideal chilling destination for the young d

cities.Name: Naggar
cities.Description: a

stays.staysDescription: Experience Himachal's offbeat Lahaul region through Zostel Sissu, a brilliantly located backpacker hostel with majestic views, vibrant common areas, outdoor games, and spacious rooms.

Rashil is, quite literally, a quaint old village on the top of a hill, by a flowing river, and overlooking the snow-clad Himalayas. The magical setting is made dreamier with brilliant sunset skies & the sight of the milky way at midnight.

cities.Name: Tabo

cities.Description: Zostel Wayanad is a quaint backpacking hostel located amidst sprawling tea plantations right at the base of the famous Chembra Peak. We offer an ideal setting for the young social travellers and digital nomads to explore Wayanad.

stays.staysDescription: Set in Shimla in the Himachal Pradesh region, Zostel Homes Theog (Shimla) offers accommodation with free private parking. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the homestay. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

A luxe villa nestled in 1000 acres of a private estate, with plush private rooms, natural bathrooms, and exclusive access to nearby waterfalls, hiking trails, and more. This villa is bookable only on a full-house basis.

Located on the banks of the laidback Karapuzha dam, this homestay is perfect for a close-knit rendezvous with the goodness of nature. It features vast balconies, a verdant lawn and bonfire area, indoor games, and hill views with a charming sunset.
Located in Thirunelly, Zostel Homes Wayanad offers a unique stay experience, brimming with unimaginable greenery and wilderness all around.
